metadata.name: BAS: A Mysterious Package
metadata.description:
It’s been some time since you have bought Bastien’s Lucky 03 or a 1/1. You might have even kind of forgotten about it, leaving it in your wallet, until now. Now you’ve found a mysterious package in front of your main door.

A suspiciously good looking box has a label “fragile” and it seems like the sender is Bastien Airdrops Inc..?  
“Oh my god”, you mumble to yourself, you almost forgot about it. “It’s here!” You snatch the package and rush inside your home to open it forgetting about anything else you were about to do at this moment.

What is it that is inside?
